info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:44PM EDT until July 01 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...EASTERN HARDY AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE COUNTIES IN EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA... At 244 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Star Tannery, or 13 miles northwest of Strasburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Yellow Spring, High View, Wilde Acres, Rock Enon Springs, Capon Springs, Lehew and High View Manor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
